reviews.author: Ariane Stough
reviews.review: We had a HORRIBLE experience trying to rent a townhome with Dwell. First off the property was available immediately, but when I toured the place it was still very dirty and needed cleaning. In addition, there were a couple doors that had

reviews.author: Marilene Silva
reviews.review: Kolton is the most competent, helpful, respectful, and kind property manager I have ever encountered. Communicative, organized, and emotionally intelligent, which is a rare in property management folks but an essential skill in success and good relationships. I 100% recommend Dwell because of this professional.

reviews.author: Emily Shumway
reviews.review: Finally an honest, helpful property management company in Whatcom county! Kolton is highly responsive, sympathetic and reasonable. Things are never perfect in an apartment complex, but Dwell tries their best to ensure everyone is happy.

reviews.author: Rachel Williams
reviews.review: We love working with Dwell! What a great property management company. We have worked a lot with Kolton - he has been on point with communicating with us. We value this working relationship and strongly recommend them to everyone! #dryguysrestoration

reviews.author: Ellie Vander Veen
reviews.review: Previously rented from Dwell and had the best experience!! Kolton went above and beyond to serve my roommates and I. Grateful for the opportunity Dwell gave us and the extraordinary service they provided.

reviews.author: Isabel Mace
reviews.review: We recently started renting with Dwell and it has been such an easy and nice experience. We have had a few issues with lights and such which is to be expected in brand new construction and they have very quickly come to help us figure out

ownerResponse.text: Thank you so much for the feedback Isabel, we have really enjoyed getting to serve you with a higher level of service.

reviews.author: carleeeyyy c
reviews.review: Dwell was great to work with in leasing a townhome! Kolton is a very responsive & knowledgeable property manager, always willing to offer help when needed! Their platform for the residence is a breeze to use & paying rent is very easy.

ownerResponse.text: We appreciate the feedback Carley, we try our best to create a seamless leasing process. We look forward to serving you more in the future!

reviews.author: Jonathan LeBlanc
reviews.review: We recently began renting a townhouse managed by Dwell and are very impressed! This unit was brand new but there were a few minor issues we found during the walkthrough, Dwell was quick to respond and resolve these issues. They are friendly, helpful, and have made our move one of the easiest yet!

ownerResponse.text: Thank you so much Jon for the positive feedback. We look forward to serving you with an unmatched level of service.

reviews.author: Elyssa Kuik
reviews.review: We've had a great experience with Dwell! Kolton went above and beyond to have everything ready for our move-in on short notice, and responds quickly and kindly to any questions we have.

ownerResponse.text: Thank you Elyssa. We've made it a priority to provide quick response times and believe communication is a key factor to our business. We appreciate the kind review and are thankful for the opportunity to serve you.

reviews.author: David Tucker
reviews.review: Great apartment and very well managed by Dwell, very responsive and always pick up the phone when I had a concern or question.

reviews.author: Andrew Ziegenfus
reviews.review: Dwell is a fantastic management company. As a vendor, they treat us with respect and are very reasonable. We look forward to continuing to work together.

reviews.author: davis kenny
reviews.review: Just another greedy property management in Bellingham. They raise went for no reason. Maintenance is horrible. Rich elite own Everything in Bellingham and dwell is just another greedy company

reviews.author: Jesse Gilbert
reviews.review: Definitely the best property manager I have used in Bellingham. They have been approachable and easy to work with! Highly recommend.

reviews.author: Ty Rawls
reviews.review: My wife and I have had awesome experience doing business with them. The Dwell team are super friendly and helpful and care for their clients! Would highly recommend! Thank you for everything you guys do.

ownerResponse.text: Thank you for the kind words Ty, we have really enjoyed getting to serve you and your wife!!

reviews.author: Karly Gilgen
reviews.review:
I absolutely love this company! SUCH AN EASY PROCESS! Moving has literally never been so easy.
100000000% recommend them if you need to rent a place to live or if you need to rent out your own place.

reviews.author: Karen L
reviews.review: Responsive, friendly and great to rent from. Been tenant with them since 2022, Kolton is awesome.

ownerResponse.text: Thanks Karen, weve really enjoyed serving you!
